Our definition of Done

13 May 2015 on software development and software quality

What is your definition of "Done"? I recently asked that question on Twitter: https://twitter.com/etagwerker/status/593499280809197568

This question is related to quality, which is a very complex concept. Something will have quality if it meets the requirements.
